posts.post_title: Wanted - Cards from the lot of 241 T206's in the latest Huggins & Scott Auction
posts.post_content:
Hi,

If you won the lot of 241 T206 cards in the latest Huggins and Scott Auction, please send me a message.  I would like to discuss purchase or trade for a few cards within that group.  

[URL="https://nov18.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?itemid=31440"]https://nov18.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?itemid=31440[/URL]

Best Regards,
Chris
